verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Now the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹנָ֥ה <WH3124> came unto Jonah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲמִתַּ֖י <WH573> of Amittai לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

ק֠וּם <WH6965> Arise לֵ֧ךְ <WH1980> go אֶל־ <WH413> to נִֽינְוֵ֛ה <WH5210> to Nineveh הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> city הַגְּדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> that great וּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> and cry עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> against כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָלְתָ֥ה <WH5927> is come up רָעָתָ֖ם <WH7451> against it for their wickedness לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> before

וַיָּ֤קָם <WH6965> rose up יוֹנָה֙ <WH3124> But Jonah לִבְרֹ֣חַ <WH1272> to flee תַּרְשִׁ֔ישָׁה <WH8659> unto Tarshish מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> from the presence יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּ֨רֶד <WH3381> and went down יָפ֜וֹ <WH3305> to Joppa וַיִּמְצָ֥א <WH4672> and he found אָנִיָּ֣ה ׀ <WH591> a ship בָּאָ֣ה <WH935> going תַרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <WH8659> to Tarshish וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> so he paid שְׂכָרָ֜הּ <WH7939> the fare וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> thereof and went down בָּהּ֙ לָב֤וֹא <WH935> into it to go עִמָּהֶם֙ <WH5973> them תַּרְשִׁ֔ישָׁה <WH8659> with them unto Tarshish מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> from the presence יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> But the LORD הֵטִ֤יל <WH2904> sent out רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> wind גְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> a great אֶל־ <WH413> on הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> into the sea וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become סַֽעַר־ <WH5591> tempest גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> and there was a mighty בַּיָּ֑ם <WH3220> in the sea וְהָ֣אֳנִיָּ֔ה <WH591> so that the ship חִשְּׁבָ֖ה <WH2803> was like לְהִשָּׁבֵֽר׃ <WH7665> to be broken

וַיִּֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> were afraid הַמַּלָּחִ֗ים <WH4419> Then the mariners וַֽיִּזְעֲקוּ֮ <WH2199> and cried אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֱלֹהָיו֒ <WH430> unto his god וַיָּטִ֨לוּ <WH2904> and cast forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֵּלִ֜ים <WH3627> the wares אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which בָּֽאֳנִיָּה֙ <WH591> that [were] in the ship אֶל־ <WH413> into הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> into the sea לְהָקֵ֖ל <WH7043> to lighten מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> But וְיוֹנָ֗ה <WH3124> [it] of them But Jonah יָרַד֙ <WH3381> was gone down אֶל־ <WH413> into יַרְכְּתֵ֣י <WH3411> into the sides הַסְּפִינָ֔ה <WH5600> of the ship וַיִּשְׁכַּ֖ב <WH7901> and he lay וַיֵּרָדַֽם׃ <WH7290> and was fast asleep

וַיִּקְרַ֤ב <WH7126> came אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about רַ֣ב <WH7227> in abundance הַחֹבֵ֔ל <WH2259> pilot וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> to him and said ל֖וֹ מַה־ <WH4100> How לְּךָ֣ נִרְדָּ֑ם <WH7290> unto him What meanest thou O sleeper ק֚וּם <WH6965> ? arise קְרָ֣א <WH7121> call אֶל־ <WH413> on אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> upon thy God אוּלַ֞י <WH194> Perhaps יִתְעַשֵּׁ֧ת <WH6245> will think הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> if so be that God לָ֖נוּ וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> we will not נֹאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> upon us that we perish

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <WH559> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶל־ <WH413> to his רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> to his fellow לְכוּ֙ <WH1980> Come וְנַפִּ֣ילָה <WH5307> and let us cast גֽוֹרָל֔וֹת <WH1486> lots וְנֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <WH3045> that we may know בְּשֶׁלְּמִ֛י <WH7945> for whose cause הָרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> this evil הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise לָ֑נוּ וַיַּפִּ֙לוּ֙ <WH5307> [is] upon us So they cast גּֽוֹרָל֔וֹת <WH1486> lots וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> fell הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <WH1486> and the lot עַל־ <WH5921> on יוֹנָֽה׃ <WH3124> upon Jonah

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> Then said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him הַגִּידָה־ <WH5046> they unto him Tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> now לָ֔נוּ בַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after לְמִי־ <WH4310> whose הָרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> us we pray thee for whose cause this evil הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise לָ֑נוּ מַה־ <WH4100> What מְּלַאכְתְּךָ֙ <WH4399> business וּמֵאַ֣יִן <WH370> whence תָּב֔וֹא <WH935> comest מָ֣ה <WH4100> What אַרְצֶ֔ךָ <WH776> common וְאֵֽי־ <WH335> how מִזֶּ֥ה <WH2088> account this עַ֖ם <WH5971> people אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> He

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> to עִבְרִ֣י <WH5680> unto them I [am] an Hebrew אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> I וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> the God הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of heaven אֲנִ֣י <WH589> and I יָרֵ֔א <WH3373> and I fear אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> which hath made אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> the sea וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּבָּשָֽׁה׃ <WH3004> and the dry

וַיִּֽירְא֤וּ <WH3372> afraid הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> Then were the men יִרְאָ֣ה <WH3373> afraid גְדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> aloud וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> and said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him מַה־ <WH4100> How זֹּ֣את <WH2063> you עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> unto him Why hast thou done כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because יָדְע֣וּ <WH3045> knew הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> this? For the men כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מִלִּפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> from the presence יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God ה֣וּא <WH1931> he בֹרֵ֔חַ <WH1272> that he fled כִּ֥י <WH3588> because הִגִּ֖יד <WH5046> because he had told לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> they

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> Then said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him מַה־ <WH4100> What נַּ֣עֲשֶׂה <WH6213> they unto him What shall we do לָּ֔ךְ וְיִשְׁתֹּ֥ק <WH8367> may be calm הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> unto thee that the sea מֵֽעָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> and כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> unto us? for the sea הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> wrought וְסֹעֵֽר׃ <WH5590> and was tempestuous

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to שָׂא֙וּנִי֙ <WH5375> unto them Take me up וַהֲטִילֻ֣נִי <WH2904> and cast me forth אֶל־ <WH413> into הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> into the sea וְיִשְׁתֹּ֥ק <WH8367> be calm הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> so shall the sea מֵֽעֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> and כִּ֚י <WH3588> for יוֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> unto you for I know אָ֔נִי <WH589> I כִּ֣י <WH3588> on בְשֶׁלִּ֔י <WH7945> that for my sake הַסַּ֧עַר <WH5591> tempest הַגָּד֛וֹל <WH1419> this great הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and

וַיַּחְתְּר֣וּ <WH2864> rowed hard הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> Nevertheless the men לְהָשִׁ֛יב <WH7725> to bring אֶל־ <WH413> to הַיַּבָּשָׁ֖ה <WH3004> [it] to the land וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָכֹ֑לוּ <WH3201> but they could כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> not for the sea הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> wrought וְסֹעֵ֖ר <WH5590> and was tempestuous עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> against

וַיִּקְרְא֨וּ <WH7121> Wherefore they cried אֶל־ <WH413> on יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> and said אָנָּ֤ה <WH577> We beseech thee יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֣א <WH4994> us נֹאבְדָ֗ה <WH6> we beseech thee let us not perish בְּנֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> life הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> for this man's הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and lay עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> and דָּ֣ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֑יא <WH5355> innocent כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for thou O LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you חָפַ֖צְתָּ <WH2654> as it pleased עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <WH6213> hast done

וַיִּשְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> So they took up אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹנָ֔ה <WH3124> Jonah וַיְטִלֻ֖הוּ <WH2904> and cast him forth אֶל־ <WH413> into הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> into the sea וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> ceased הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> and the sea מִזַּעְפּֽוֹ׃ <WH2197> from her raging

וַיִּֽירְא֧וּ <WH3372> feared הָאֲנָשִׁ֛ים <WH376> the men יִרְאָ֥ה <WH3373> afraid גְדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> greatly אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּֽזְבְּחוּ־ <WH2076> and offered זֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2077> a sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַֽיִּדְּר֖וּ <WH5087> and made נְדָרִֽים׃ <WH5088> vows

וַיְמַ֤ן <WH4487> had prepared יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Now the LORD דָּ֣ג <WH1709> fish גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> a great לִבְלֹ֖עַ <WH1104> to swallow up אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹנָ֑ה <WH3124> Jonah וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become יוֹנָה֙ <WH3124> And Jonah בִּמְעֵ֣י <WH4578> was in the belly הַדָּ֔ג <WH1709> of the fish שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> three יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> and three לֵילֽוֹת׃ <WH3915> nights
